mapper.insert: INSERT INTO bookmark (member_seq, bookName, activate, regDate) VALUES (#{member_seq}, #{bookName}, 1, NOW())

SELECT seq FROM bookmark WHERE member_seq = #{member_seq} AND bookName = #{bookName}
INSERT INTO bookmarkPhoto (bookmark_seq, photo_uciCode, regDate) VALUES (#{seq}, #{photo_uciCode}, NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT seq, member_seq, bookName, activate, regDate FROM bookmark WHERE member_seq = #{member_seq}

SELECT A.seq, A.member_seq, A.bookName, A.activate, A.regDate, B.photo_uciCode FROM bookmark A INNER JOIN bookmarkPhoto B ON A.seq = B.bookmark_seq WHERE A.member_seq = #{member_seq} AND B.photo_uciCode = #{photo_uciCode}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM bookmark WHERE member_seq = #{member_seq} AND bookName = #{bookName}
